name: T.G.H.A.G.M
description:
This game was made in 3 days.

The game haven't good music or sound because i am not good at making music. 

How to Play?

Press H to Take Hint.

Suggestion

Fullscreen for best experience.

Bug:

If you miss the catchword, R Shift to Quit.  Sorry about that i forget to add this to hint text.
